entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump weren't the National Guard moved OUT?  isn't that what you were just bitchin' about

you failed with coronavirus and 111,374 Americans are dead 

you FAILED with George Floyd and have only escalated the problem

and yet you sit, watch tv and tweet from the WH https://t.co/TuVuHUTs5K
